title: Add photo gallery and 'forever yours with love bablet' message

requirements.summary: Add a photo gallery section displaying 8 uploaded user photos in an elegant layout
acceptanceCriteria: All 8 uploaded photos are displayed in the photo gallery
Photos are stored in frontend/public/assets and referenced correctly
Gallery layout is responsive and visually harmonious with the existing apology page design
Photos maintain their aspect ratios and are displayed clearly

file_operations.description: Create a PhotoGallery component that displays the 8 user photos (Snapchat-1302406921.jpg, Snapchat-818160405.jpg, Snapchat-1302406921-1.jpg, Snapchat-818160405-1.jpg, Snapchat-818160405-2.jpg, Snapchat-1302406921-2.jpg, Snapchat-1302406921-3.jpg, Snapchat-818160405-3.jpg) from frontend/public/assets in a responsive grid layout that complements the existing emotional theme with rose, coral, and peach tones

Import and integrate the PhotoGallery component into the existing apology page layout, positioning it below the main apology message and above or below the 'forever yours with love bablet' message to create a cohesive emotional flow

requirements.summary: Display 'forever yours with love bablet' message prominently with intimate typography
acceptanceCriteria: The exact text 'forever yours with love bablet' appears on the page

Message is clearly visible and readable
